snippet.title: Soul Reverse Zero - Rank 1~11 Gameplay - Android on PC - F2P - JP
snippet.description:
This game launched recently in Japan by Sega and decided to try. This is a Turn Based RPG+TCG, it looks like the classic 3D JRPG with cool attack animations, full voice heroes and nice artworks. The game is not the most innovative but it's addictive and simple to understand even if you don't know japanese. You can use the store with your google play account but it's limited to gems only and a bit overpriced :(

- Game website: https://zero.soulreverse.jp/

- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sega.srzero
- Apk: https://apkpure.com/soul-reverse-zero/com.sega.srzero

- iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/jp/app/id1144749024

Installed size: 684Mb

Opening Theme: "e of s" by Hiroyuki Sawano featuring Mizuki

Video recorded playing on PC with Bluestacks v2.5.70.6309
- http://www.bluestacks.com

Video recorded & edited by rendermax.
http://www.youtube.com/rendermax
http://rendermax.tumblr.com/

Feel free to join my QQ group: 294416707

Want more? Vote, Comment, Subscribe and Share! Thx :D
